definition: intended to test a new system under operating conditions and to familiarize the operators with the system, extortion of money (as by blackmail)
details:
adjective
- intended to test a new system under operating conditions and to familiarize the operators with the system
= example: intended to test a new system under operating conditions and to familiarize the operators with the system
noun
- extortion of money (as by blackmail)
- a very thorough search of a person or a place
= example: a very thorough search of a person or a place
- initial adjustments to improve the functioning or the efficiency and to bring to a more satisfactory state
= example: initial adjustments to improve the functioning or the efficiency and to bring to a more satisfactory state
